verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: Those who, when they take a measure from people, they take in full.
verse.verse_3: But when they measure or weigh to others, they cheat.
verse.verse_4: Do these not know that they will be resurrected?
verse.verse_6: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?
verse.verse_7: Not at all. The record of the wicked is in Sijjeen.
verse.verse_8: But how can you know what Sijjeen is?
verse.verse_10: Woe on that Day to the deniers.
verse.verse_11: Those who deny the Day of Reckoning.
verse.verse_12: But none denies it except the sinful aggressor.
verse.verse_13: When Our revelations are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the ancients."
verse.verse_14: Not at all. Their hearts have become corroded by what they used to earn.
verse.verse_15: Not at all. On that Day, they will be screened from their Lord.
verse.verse_16: Then they will roast in Hell.
verse.verse_17: Then it will be said, "This is what you used to deny."
verse.verse_18: No indeed; the record of the righteous is in Elliyyeen.
verse.verse_19: But how can you know what Elliyyoon is?
verse.verse_22: Indeed, the righteous will be amid bliss.
verse.verse_24: You will recognize on their faces the radiance of bliss.
verse.verse_25: They will be given to drink a sealed wine.
verse.verse_26: Whose seal is musk-this is what competitors should compete for.
verse.verse_28: A spring from which those brought near drink.
verse.verse_29: Those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
verse.verse_30: And when they passed by them, they would wink at one another.
verse.verse_31: And when they went back to their families, they would go back exulting.
verse.verse_32: And if they saw them, they would say, "These people are lost."
verse.verse_33: Yet they were not sent as guardians over them.
verse.verse_34: But on that Day, those who believed will laugh at the unbelievers.
verse.verse_36: Have the unbelievers been repaid for what they used to do?
